item.title: Pressure Stop Fitting Assemblies (Upper Deck Door(s)) – Freighter with Draw-Through Smoke Detection System – Flight Pressurized Manual Mode Only

remarks.para: One forward fitting assembly and/or one aft fitting assembly per door may be missing or inoperative provided:

numlitem.para: There are no visible defects on remaining fitting assemblies for associated door(s),
Cabin altitude auto controller is operative,
Maximum cabin pressure differential is limited to 6.1 psi.
Use Manual Cabin Altitude Control. Do not exceed maximum cabin pressure differential limit of 6.1 psi.

note.para: When at FL290 MSL with a 6.1 psi cabin pressure differential, the cabin altitude will be approximately 9,000 ft.

limitation.para: Flight is limited to FL290 MSL.

placard.para: Placard below Captain's PFD on P-1-1 panel: "U/D DOOR____PRESS STOP FITTING MISSING/INOP: MAX PRESSURE DIFF 6.1 PSI". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

numlitem.para: Visually inspect remaining fittings on affected door(s) for defects.
